This is a collection of Riddles written by an unorganized team of Riddlers at Sphinx Industry. Long Click a list item in order to get its author. This application is free and open source, found with the button on the task bar above. The riddles themselves are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs.

If one is interested in hints and/or answers to these riddles, we Riddlers accept donations in the form of check, cash, or Bitcoin. Please email us Riddlers by clicking the mail button above.

Concerning the answers , keep in mind that while some articles (e.g. the or a) are accepted, all answers can be provided without an article.
